Action.author: kopaygorodsky
Action.body: use dind (docker in docker). pod has 2 containers: peer + dind. you can share docker endpoint from dind to peer using emptydir volume.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: If you move to Fabric 2.x or later, you can create a custom launcher|https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-2.2/cc_launcher.html to launch chaincode as a Kube pod rather than requiring access to a Docker daemon.
